text.div:
This case-insensitive code system http://worldhealthorganization.github.io/smart/CodeSystem/HIV.A defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
DE1 First nameClient's first or given name
DE2 Family nameClient's family name or last name
DE3 Visit dateThe date and time of the client's visit
DE4 ReferralIf client was referred for care
DE5 Referred byHow the client was referred
DE6 CommunityReferred by the community level services
DE7 FacilityReferred by the health facility
DE8 Unique identifierUnique identifier generated for new clients or a universal ID, if used in the country
DE9 National IDNational unique identifier assigned to the client, if used in the country
DE10 National health IDNational health unique identifier assigned to the client, if used in the country
DE11 National programme IDNational programme unique identifier assigned to the client, if used in the country
DE12 National health insurance IDNational health insurance unique identifier assigned to the client, if used in the country
DE13 Country of birthCountry where the client was born
DE14 Date of birthThe client's date of birth (DOB) if known
DE15 Date of birth unknownIs the client's DOB is unknown?
DE16 Estimated ageIf DOB is unknown, enter the client's estimated age. Display client's age in number of years.
DE17 AgeCalculated age (number of years) of the client based on date of birth
DE18 Gender*Gender of the client*
DE19 FemaleClient identifies as female
DE20 MaleClient identifies as male
DE21 Transgender maleClient identifies as transgender male
DE22 Transgender femaleClient identifies as transgender female
DE23 OtherAdditional category
DE24 Other (specify)Additional category (please specify)
DE25 SexSex of the client assigned at birth
DE26 FemaleClient identifies as female
DE27 MaleClient identifies as male
DE28 OtherClient identifies in non-binary way or as a sexual and gender minority (or minorities)
DE29 AddressClient's home address or address which the client is consenting to disclose
DE30 Marital StatusClient's current marital status
DE31 UnmarriedClient does not have an active marriage contract
DE32 Never marriedClient has never entered into a marriage contract
DE33 MarriedA current marriage contract is active
DE34 PolygamousClient is in a polygamous union
DE35 Divorced Client is divorced, whereby marriage contract has been declared dissolved and inactive
DE36 WidowedClient's spouse has died
DE37 UnknownClient does not wish to disclose marital status
DE38 Domestic partnerClient reports that they are in a domestic partnership
DE39 AnnulledClient's marriage contract has been declared null and to have not existed
DE40 Legally separatedClient is legally separated from their spouse
DE41 InterlocutoryClient is subject to an interlocutory decree
DE42 Telephone numberClient's telephone number (a landline or a mobile phone number)
DE43 [Administrative Area]This should be a context-specific list of administrative areas, such as villages, districts, etc. The purpose of this data element is to allow for grouping and flagging of client data to a particular facility's catchment area. This can be input into the system by the end user OR it can be automated in the database based on the end user's attributes.
DE44 Communication consentIndication that client gave consent to be contacted
DE45 Reminder messagesWhether client wants to receive text or other messages as follow-up for HIV services
DE46 Communication preference(s)How the client would like to receive family planning communications
DE47 Text message/SMSThe client would like to receive communications via Text message/SMS
DE48 Voice callClient would like to receive communications via voice call
DE49 Client's emailClient's primary email account where the client can be contacted
DE50 Alternate contact's nameName of an alternate contact, which could be next of kin (e.g. partner, husband, mother, sibling, etc.). The alternate contact would be used in the case of an emergency situation.
DE51 Alternate contact's phone numberPhone number of the alternate contact
DE52 Alternate contact's addressAlternate contact's home address or address which the client is consenting to disclose
DE53 Alternate contact relationshipThe alternate contact's relationship to the client (e.g. partner, husband, mother, sibling, etc.)

name: HIV_A
title: HIV.A  Registration CodeSystem
description: CodeSystem for HIV.A  Registration Data Elements
